channel.title: Home on Lang ZI blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Lang ZI blog

item.title: How to enable table of content ?
item.description: Table of content This theme supports displaying table of content in blog posts. To enable it, globally set toc to true in config.toml: [params] toc = true This will enable table of content for all posts. If you want to enable it for a specific post, add toc = true to the front matter of the post: --- title: How to enable table of content date: 2023-05-02 toc: true ---

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

author: “Langzi” title: “Mysql源码编译安装” date: 2023-08-07T14:46:09+08:00 description: “Mysql源码编译安装脚本” #~/#!/usr/bin/env bash #!/bin/bash #配置初始安装环境，安装依赖包 curl -o /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo https://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/Centos-7.repo && yum makecache rpm -qa | grep mariadb rpm -e mariadb-libs --nodeps #卸载mariadb以免与MySQL冲突 rm -rf /etc/my* yum install -y wget vim bash-completion yum-utils gcc gcc-c++ openssl openssl-devel bison ncurses ncurses-devel cmake libaio-devel m4 #监测用户和组是否存在，不存在则创建 groups mysql >>/dev/null if [ $? == 0 ] then echo "mysql组已存在" else groupadd -r mysql fi id mysql >>/dev/null if [ $?

item.title: About
item.description: Written in Go, Hugo is an open source static site generator available under the Apache Licence 2.0. Hugo supports TOML, YAML and JSON data file types, Markdown and HTML content files and uses shortcodes to add rich content. Other notable features are taxonomies, multilingual mode, image processing, custom output formats, HTML/CSS/JS minification and support for Sass SCSS workflows. Hugo makes use of a variety of open source projects including: https://github.com/yuin/goldmark https://github.
